name: doctor finder
description: 1. Configuration/dependencies/Objectives       Business logic is thoroughly tested with Jasmine.       Karma is set up correctly. Required functionality was in place by the Friday deadline.       Project demonstrates understanding of week's concepts. If prompted, you are able to discuss your code with an instructor using correct terminology.

scripts.test: npm run build; karma start karma.conf.js
